rows.label: qst104225_msg0002
rows.name:
Can you find all kinds of
cool treasure in the Cloud
Sea really easily?!

rows.label: qst104225_msg0021
rows.name:
I sure can! I've salvaged so much,
I could probably find treasure with
my eyes closed at this point.

rows.label: qst104225_msg0022
rows.name:
Wow! I wanna see you salvaging
sometime, Rex-sensei!

rows.label: qst104225_msg0041
rows.name:
Well, it wouldn't be that easy. I'd
probably have to salvage quite a lot
of times to find the really good stuff.

rows.label: qst104225_msg0042
rows.name:
Oh, I see. I always thought
you just dive in and bring up
amazing treasure every time!

rows.label: qst104225_msg0043
rows.name:
I've never seen Rex-sensei
salvaging! Show me, please!
